original_text: But in one single hour God has destroyed all those valuable things.’ All the sailors and the people who travel on ships will also be sad. They include every ship's captain, and everyone who works on ships on the sea. They will stand a long way from the city. But in one single hour God has destroyed all those valuable things.’ All the sailors and the people who travel on ships will also be sad. They include every ship's captain, and everyone who works on ships on the sea. They will stand a long way from the city. But in one single hour God has destroyed all those valuable things.’
korean_text: 그러한 부가 한 시간에 망하였도다 모든 선장과 각처를 다니는 선객들과 선원들과 바다에서 일하는 자들이 멀리 서서

sentences.original_text: God has destroyed all those valuable things.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그 모든 귀한 것들을 멸망시켰습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the people who travel on ships
and everyone who works on ships
sentences.korean_translation: 바다에서 배에서 일하는 모든 사람을 포함합니다.

sentences.original_text: They will stand a long way from the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 도시에서 멀리 떨어져 서 있을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: God has destroyed all those valuable things.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그 모든 귀한 것들을 멸망시켰습니다.
